title: Slave Gamble
description: Slave Gamble By Claire Thompson "He won me in a card game." Yes, it sounded crazy to Zo too, but when David Turner won an evening with the lovely young woman, it was one she wouldn't soon forget. With gentle dominance, David was to take Zo on a journey of erotic submission that would leave her breathless and begging for more. It was a gamble she wouldn't take lightly, but the winning hand was more than she ever dreamed of. A real D/s love story.
author: Claire Thompson
